name: The Invisible 11%
description: The Invisible 11% is a survival game based in a city where the player takes on the role of a beggar. The game aims to explore the concept of social indifference by making the player reflect on how an apparently banal environment, such as life in a big city, can be a huge challenge to a homeless person. The game adopts a minimalist style, seeking to focus the player solely on the essential elements of the game.
